name: Six Match
description:
Enter the Match-3 board as Mr Swap-With-Coins and try to make a match in 6 turns or less.

It's like a sliding tile puzzle crossed with a Match-3 game.

As the coins keep dropping, so do new mechanics:

* Get wild-card-coins from matching 4 or junction-match to create a bomb.
* Each match gives you a card, collect matching cards for bonus score.
* Lucrative un-matchable diamonds you can only collect at the bottom of the board.
* Wrap your mind around coin-cages that push whole lines of coins.
* Yet more mechanics, but why spoil it all?

Six Match also features:

* A puzzle mode with bite sized challenges.
* Gamepad support.
* Auto-save.
* No pay-to-win or timers.

Six Match is now a self-contained paid app:
Ads, in-app purchases, and social features have been removed to ensure the longevity of this game.
